text: glenn_rhee What is that ?
shane_walsh opens the door to Rick 's room and looks out to see a group of men in military gear are running past him and up the hallway .
shane_walsh Hey hey . Whoa whoa shane tries to get anyone 's attention but they keep running past . He grabs a nurse by the arm .
shane_walsh Ma'am . Ma'am , please . Please , can you help me ?
nurse No no ! She breaks free and runs along with the others . shane looks back the way they came .

man Check them all . Check them all shane runs down the hall where all the people had just run . Just as he grabs a gurney he looks down around the corner and he sees men in full camouflage gear with gas masks shooting doctors and nurses . After they all have been shot one of the soldiers puts a bullet in each person 's head . Behind one of the soldiers a double door opens . A walker comes through and grabs him . Startled he starts firing off rounds into the ceiling . More walkers come through and the group of soldiers is overwhelmed . shane grabs the gurney and runs back to Rick 's room . shane is panting . shane leaves the gurney outside and goes into the room where rick lays lifelessly .
shane_walsh Okay . I 'm gon na get you out of here , bud shane grunts . shane tries but ca n't quite pick rick up . shane looks at the monitor with Rick 's vitals .
shane_walsh Okay . Okay shane squats down on the far side of Rick 's bed . He looks at the monitor and back at Rick .

shane_walsh What do I do ? shane ducks down . A soldier in riot gear looks into the room . He does n't see shane and he hesitates when he sees rick lying lifeless in the bed . Behind him comes more of his troop .
man Come on , corporal . Move out ! The soldier backs out the door and follows command .
shane_walsh Listen to me . If you 're gon na wake up , I need you to do it now . Okay ? Now . Please , man , you just show me a sign , anything . Please rick .
man The place is coming down ! Fall back ! All units fall back shane puts his head to Rick 's chest but can not hear any sounds .

shane_walsh I 'm . I 'm okay shane goes out the door , his gun out and ready . The soldiers have passed Rick 's room and but they are continuing to shoot every one they see . shane looks behind him and sees walkers coming up the hallway toward him . Gunfire ahead of him , walkers behind him , shane opens the door to Rick 's room . rick is still lying there as if he were dead . shane points his gun at the walkers but does n't fire . He covers his mouth with a towel , pulls the door closed and pushes the gurney up against Rick 's door . He backs away from the walkers , pointing but not shooting his gun , turns and runs . The group is just outside the C. D. C. still standing in the light from the open doorway .
shane_walsh Daryl , you cover the back .
rick_grimes Hello ? Hello ?
dale_horvath Close those doors . Watch for walkers The group enters and looks around at the lobby . It 's completely empty .
rick_grimes Hello ? jenner is standing in a doorway , a rifle in his hands .
edwin_jenner Anybody infected ?
rick_grimes One of our group was . He did n't make it .
edwin_jenner Why are you here ? What do you want ?
rick_grimes A chance .
edwin_jenner That 's asking an awful lot these days .
rick_grimes I know jenner looks at every one .
edwin_jenner You all submit to a blood test . That 's the price of admission .
rick_grimes We can do that jenner lowers his weapon .
edwin_jenner You got stuff to bring in , you do it now . Once this door closes it stays closed They all run through the doors and follow jenner into an elevator .
edwin_jenner Vi , seal the main entrance . Kill the power up here .
rick_grimes rick Grimes They all run through the doors and follow jenner into an elevator .
edwin_jenner Dr. edwin jenner .
daryl_dixon Doctors always go around packing heat like that ?

edwin_jenner There were plenty left lying around . I familiarized myself . But you look harmless enough . Except you , I 'll have to keep my eye on you carl smiles back at the doctor . edwin chuckles . When he looks away the smile on his face dies . Out of the elevator edwin leads them down a hallway .
carol_peletier Are we underground ?
edwin_jenner Are you claustrophobic ?
carol_peletier A little .
edwin_jenner Try not to think about it They enter the large darkened space edwin had been in before .
edwin_jenner Vi , bring up the lights in the big room . Welcome to zone 5 .
rick_grimes Where is everybody ? The other doctors , the staff ?
edwin_jenner I 'm it . It 's just me here .
lori_grimes What about the person you were speaking with ? Vi ?
edwin_jenner Vi , say hello to our guests . Tell them . welcome .
computer Hello , guests . Welcome .
edwin_jenner I 'm all that 's left . I 'm sorry edwin takes Andrea 's blood for a sample . Everyone else is done .
andrea_harrison What 's the point ? If we were infected , we 'd all be running a fever .
edwin_jenner I 've already broken every rule in the book letting you in here . Let me just at least be thorough . All done .
andrea_harrison Ooh As she stands andrea starts to black out . jacqui catches her .
edwin_jenner Are you okay ?
andrea_harrison Mmm .
jacqui She has n't eaten in days . None of us have Everyone , including Edwin , is seated at a large round table eating pasta and drinking wine .
lori_grimes Fine .
dale_horvath You know , in Italy , children have a little bit of wine with dinner . And in France .
lori_grimes Well , when carl is in Italy or France , he can have some then .
rick_grimes What 's it gon na hurt ? Come on . Come on .
carl_grimes What ? dale hands carl a glass with half an inch of wine in it .
dale_horvath There you are , young lad Everyone watches .
carl_grimes Eww .
lori_grimes That 's my boy . That 's my boy . Good boy She pours his wine into her glass .
carl_grimes Yuck . That tastes nasty .
shane_walsh Well , just stick to soda pop there , bud .
daryl_dixon Not you , glenn .
glenn_rhee What ?
daryl_dixon Keep drinking , little man . I want to see how red your face can get rick sees that edwin is n't enjoying the party . He takes his fork and taps his glass .
rick_grimes It seems to me we have n't thanked our host properly .
theodore_douglas He is more than just our host .
dale_horvath Hear hear !
daryl_dixon Here 's to you , Doc . Booyah !
dale_horvath Booyah !
rick_grimes Thank you . Thank you , doctor .
theodore_douglas Booyah !
shane_walsh So when are you gon na tell us what the Hell happened here , Doc ? All the — the other doctors that were supposed to be figuring out what happened , where are they ?
rick_grimes We 're celebrating , Shane . Do n't need to do this now .
shane_walsh Whoa , wait a second . This is why we 're here , right ? This was your move — supposed to find all the answers . Instead we — we found him . Found one man , why ?
edwin_jenner Well , when things got bad , a lot of people just left , went off to be with their families . And when things got worse , when the military cordon got overrun , the rest bolted .
shane_walsh Every last one ?
edwin_jenner No , many could n't face walking out the door . They . opted out . There was a rash of suicides . That was a bad time .
andrea_harrison You did n't leave . Why ?
edwin_jenner I just kept working , hoping to do some good .
glenn_rhee Dude , you are such a buzzkill , man edwin shows them the rest of the living area .

edwin_jenner Most of the facility is powered down including housing so you 'll have to make do here . The couches are comfortable , but there are cots in storage if you like . There 's a rec room down the hall that you kids might enjoy . Just do n't plug in the video games , okay ? Or anything that draws power . The same applies — if you shower , go easy on the hot water .
glenn_rhee Hot water ?
theodore_douglas That 's what the man said lori stands under the running water , ecstatic . t - dog lets the water run over his head in his shower . And glenn does the same .

glenn_rhee Ah ! rick joins lori while in his shower , he kisses her romantically . In his shower shane drinks straight from a whiskey bottle . andrea sits in hers and cries . Dressed , rick walks down the hallway , drinking from a bottle of wine . He smiles as he passes Dale .
dale_horvath Hey dale turns to enter a shower but he stops when he hears andrea inside the one across the hall .
dale_horvath Andrea ? dale goes in and sees her at the toilet being sick .
dale_horvath That 's it . That 's it . Get it out . There you go .
andrea_harrison Oh . god She backs away from Dale , not wanting comfort .
andrea_harrison Oh . Everything 's gone .
dale_horvath It 's always better going down than coming up , huh ?
andrea_harrison I do n't mean the wine , Dale . You know , it 's over . There 's nothing left . Do n't you see that ?
dale_horvath Oh , I — I see a — a chance to make a new start .
andrea_harrison Oh my God , Dale . Dale , did n't you see the look on Jenner 's face ? Hear what I 'm saying . There 's nothing left rick and his bottle of wine join jenner in the big room .
rick_grimes How 's the blood ?
edwin_jenner No surprises .
rick_grimes I came to thank you .
edwin_jenner You did rick tries to lean against a console but instead he falls to the floor in a sitting position .
edwin_jenner You all -- you all right ?

rick_grimes You do n't know what it 's like . You do n't know what it 's like out there . You may think you do , but you do n't . We 'd have died out there . It was only a matter of time . There 's too many of those things . My — My boy . My — My wife , I never — I never told 'em what I really thought . I never even hinted , just — just kept it in . kept it in and kept us moving , you know . Just kept it in . Kept us . Overcome with emotion rick stammers into silence .

edwin_jenner It 'll all be okay . It 'll be okay Carl , carol and sophia are in the rec room . The kids are playing checkers and carol is reading a book . lori comes in , smiling , a glass of wine in her hand . They look relaxed and happy . They smile when lori walks in .
lori_grimes Any good books ?
carol_peletier Uh - huh . Enough to keep us busy for years . All right . Come on , kids , it 's bed time .
lori_grimes Baby , go say your prayers . I 'm gon na browse a bit .
carol_peletier Come on . This is the first night we might actually get some real sleep .
lori_grimes Hmm .

carol_peletier It 's a miracle , is n't it ? carol taps sophia on the nose then leads them out into the hall that leads to their bedrooms . From a different doorway shane peers in , watching Lori . He does n't look sober . She 's reading the dust jacket of a book and does n't see him . Watching for her reaction he pulls the door knob . lori looks around , startled . She sees shane and she 's not happy .
lori_grimes Jesus , you scared me .
shane_walsh I 'm gon na tell you a few things and you 're gon na listen to me .
lori_grimes Now is not the time She tries to ignore shane by reading the cover of the book in her hand .
shane_walsh Come on . When is it ever the time ? shane still has the whiskey bottle . lori gives up trying to ignore in and instead goes to leave .
shane_walsh How can you treat me like this ? He blocks Lori 's way to the door .
lori_grimes You 're kidding , right ?
shane_walsh No . Huh - uh .
lori_grimes Because you told me my husband was dead She walks around him .

shane_walsh Jesus , Lori . I did n't lie to you , all right ? I did n't . Do you know what it was like there ? Huh ? As he talks he walks past Lori . Before she can walk out the open door he pulls it closed and stands in front of it .
shane_walsh Stop . Things were falling apart . They were slaughtering people in the hallways . It was a massacre . There were walkers everywhere .
lori_grimes So you left him ?

shane_walsh Everybody else ran . There were no doctors there . It was just me . He was hooked up to machines and I did not know what to do . I even took my ear and I put it on his chest and I listened for a heartbeat and I did not hear one . And I - I - I - I — I do n't know why . Maybe it was gunfire . I do n't know what it was , but there was no way he could 've survived that . No way shane bangs the door in frustration .
lori_grimes He did .
shane_walsh Yeah , but then I had y' all to think about , did n't I ? He takes lori by the shoulders . She backs away from him until she 's backed up to a table .
shane_walsh I had you and Carl , and I needed to think about—.
lori_grimes Okay . No no .
shane_walsh I had to get you guys safe to Atlanta . That 's what I had to do . Just stop lori tries to get up but he pushes her back again .

shane_walsh If you thought for one second that he was still alive , would you have come ? So I saved your life — you and your little boy 's . That 's what I did . Right ? Lori , speechless , shakes her head .
shane_walsh And if I could 've traded places with him , I would have . I would trade places with him right now because—.
lori_grimes No no no . No .
shane_walsh No no no , you -- I love you . Shh shh .
lori_grimes No . No , you 're drunk .
shane_walsh I love you .
lori_grimes No , you 're drunk .

shane_walsh And I know there were some things that say that you love me , too . Because there 's no way that you could 've been with me the way that you were shane keeps pushing in closer and closer . He holds her chin with his hand to keep her from looking away . lori keeps trying to fight him off .
lori_grimes Shane . Shane . Shane !
shane_walsh Just — Okay , Stop . Listen . You love me .
lori_grimes Get your hands off me . Get your hands off me He reaches down between her legs .
shane_walsh I love you . There 's nobody here .
lori_grimes Please ! No !

shane_walsh Stop , Lori . It 's all right . Just — lori grabs Shane 's neck and pulls back her hand , scratching him . He stops , stares at Lori . He puts his hand to his mouth . lori stares at him , terrified . shane turns away , opens the door , and walks out . Shaking , lori stands by the table and tries to pull herself together . The door to rick and Lori 's room opens . A very tipsy rick tries to sneak in quietly . He gently closes the door . carl is asleep on the couch . lori lies quietly on the cot . rick falls onto the bed with her . He puts his arm on lori and pulls her to him . He strokes her hair and reassures her .

rick_grimes We do n't have to be afraid anymore . We 're safe here . All right ? Holding her face he kisses Lori . She tries to smile but when she turns over so they can spoon she 's still crying . The next morning rick walks to the table where others are having breakfast .
rick_grimes Hello .
dale_horvath Morning .
carl_grimes Are you hungover ? Mom said you 'd be .
rick_grimes Mom is right .
lori_grimes Mom has that annoying habit .
theodore_douglas Eggs . Powered , but -- but I do'em good glenn moans .
theodore_douglas I bet you ca n't tell dale laughs at Glenn 's misery and T - Dog 's teasing . jacqui rubs Glenn 's shoulders . t - dog dishes out the eggs to all , including Glenn .
theodore_douglas Protein helps the hangover glenn is moaning . rick holds up a bottle of aspirin .
rick_grimes Where 'd all this come from ?
lori_grimes jenner .
rick_grimes Could you help me , please ? lori opens the bottle for Rick .
lori_grimes He thought we could use it .
rick_grimes Thank you .
lori_grimes Some of us , at least jacqui is comforting glenn who has his head down , miserable .
glenn_rhee Do n't ever ever ever let me drink again .
shane_walsh Hey .
rick_grimes Hey . Feel as bad as I do ? shane walks to the table where the coffee pot and cups are .
shane_walsh Worse t - dog sees the scratches on Shane 's face and neck .
theodore_douglas What the hell happened to you ? Your neck ? shane looks puzzled .
shane_walsh I must have done it in my sleep .
rick_grimes Never seen you do that before .
shane_walsh Me neither . Not like me at all lori eats her food and does n't look up .
edwin_jenner Morning .
shane_walsh Hey , Doc Everyone at the table greets the doctor .
dale_horvath Doctor . I do n't mean to slam you with questions first thing—.
edwin_jenner But you will anyway .
andrea_harrison We did n't come here for the eggs jenner leads everyone into the big room .
edwin_jenner Give me playback of TS-19 .
vi Playback of TS-19 .
edwin_jenner Few people ever got a chance to see this . Very few Up on the wall an oversized display shows varying 3-D views of human skulls .
carl_grimes Is that a brain ?
edwin_jenner An extraordinary one . Not that it matters in the end . Take us in for E. I. V.

vi Enhanced internal view The main screen changes to show the upper shoulders and head of the subject . The screen skews to a horizontal view then increases the magnification . The image becomes more and more detailed . The magnification shows the Inside the skull . It appears to be lit with bright blue threads of energy . Some areas are denser with light than others but there are lighted threads throughout the skull . The detail zooms in until the threads become closer and pulses of light can be distinguished .
shane_walsh What are those lights ?

edwin_jenner It 's a person 's life — experiences , memories . It 's everything . Somewhere in all that organic wiring , all those ripples of light , is you — the thing that makes you unique and human .
daryl_dixon You do n't make sense ever ?
edwin_jenner Those are synapses . Electric impulses in the brain that carry all the messages . They determine everything a person says does or thinks from the moment of birth to the moment of death .
rick_grimes Death ? That 's what this is , a vigil ?
edwin_jenner Yes . Or rather the playback of the vigil .
andrea_harrison This person died ? Who ?
edwin_jenner Test subject 19 . Someone who was bitten and infected . and volunteered to have us record the process . VI , Scan forward to the first event .

vi Scanning to first event The screen shows a message """" Scanning Forward """" The brain has lights still flickering in the outer areas but the center has become dark as if black roots were growing inside .

edwin_jenner It invades the brain like meningitis . The adrenal glands hemorrhage , the brain goes into shutdown , then the major organs . Then death . Everything you ever were or ever will be . gone .
sophia Is that what happened to Jim ?
carol_peletier Yes Andrea 's tears catch Edwin 's attention .
lori_grimes She lost somebody two days ago . Her sister .
edwin_jenner I lost somebody too . I know how devastating it is . Scan to the second event .
vi Scanning to second event .

edwin_jenner The resurrection times vary wildly . We had reports of it happening in as little as three minutes . The longest we heard of was eight hours . In the case of this patient , it was two hours , one minute . seven seconds A red glow flickers at the base of the brain . The rest remains dark . Random sparks shoot out into the larger area of the brain but no further lights grow .
lori_grimes It restarts the brain ?
edwin_jenner No , just the brain stem . Basically , it gets them up and moving .
rick_grimes But they 're not alive ?
edwin_jenner You tell me .
rick_grimes It 's nothing like before . Most of that brain is dark .

edwin_jenner Dark , lifeless , dead . The frontal lobe , the neocortex , the human part — that does n't come back . The you part . Just a shell driven by mindless instinct The subject moves , its mouth opens and closes . The head moves side to side , the shoulders move as if the arms were being lifted . The barrel of a gun appears at the forehead pointing down . A bullet enters the brain and tears through the red cluster of embers . The brain goes completely dark , the subject stops moving .
carol_peletier God . What was that ?
andrea_harrison He shot his patient in the head . Did n't you ?
edwin_jenner VI , Power down the main screen and the workstations .
vi Powering down main screen and workstations .
andrea_harrison You have no idea what it is , do you ?
edwin_jenner It could be microbial , viral , parasitic , fungal .
jacqui Or the wrath of god ?
edwin_jenner There is that .
andrea_harrison Somebody must know something . Somebody somewhere .
carol_peletier There are others , right ? Other facilities ?
edwin_jenner There may be some . People like me .
rick_grimes But you do n't know ? How can you not know ?
edwin_jenner Everything went down . Communications , directives — all of it . I 've been in the dark for almost a month .
andrea_harrison So it 's not just here . There 's nothing left anywhere ? Nothing ? That 's what you 're really saying , right ?
jacqui Jesus .
daryl_dixon Man , I 'm gon na get shitfaced drunk again .
dale_horvath Dr. Jenner , I know this has been taxing for you and I hate to ask one more question , but . that clock — it 's counting down . What happens at zero ?
edwin_jenner The basement generators -- they run out of fuel .
rick_grimes And then ? edwin ignores the question and walks out of the big room .
rick_grimes Vi , what happens when the power runs out ?

vi When the power runs out , facility - wide decontamination will occur Several of the group runs down stairs looking for the generators . Lights automatically come on as they enter the basement . The lights come on .
glenn_rhee Decontamination -- what does that mean ?
shane_walsh I do n't like the way jenner clammed up . The way he just wandered off like that .
theodore_douglas What 's wrong with him ? Seriously , man . Is he nuts , medicated , what ? rick looks at a map on the wall .
rick_grimes In there The lights in the room come on when the door opens .

rick_grimes Check that way . shane shane follows Rick . They walk through the utility room looking for the generator . rick finds a barrel with a hose coming out of it . rick sees the gauge reads almost empty . He tests the barrel .
rick_grimes It 's empty Lights flicker and go out , different lighting comes on .
vi Emergency lighting on .
shane_walsh What the hell is this ? glenn and t - dog run up .
glenn_rhee Hey , you guys kill the lights ?
shane_walsh Nah , it just went out .
rick_grimes Anything ?
theodore_douglas Yeah , a lot of dead generators and more empty fuel drums than I can count .
shane_walsh It ca n't be down to just that one The lights in the room come on when the door opens .

rick_grimes Check that way . shane shane follows Rick . They walk through the utility room looking for the generator . rick finds a barrel with a hose coming out of it . rick sees the gauge reads almost empty . He tests the barrel .
rick_grimes It 's empty Lights flicker and go out , different lighting comes on .
vi Emergency lighting on .
shane_walsh What the hell is this ? glenn and t - dog run up .
glenn_rhee Hey , you guys kill the lights ?
shane_walsh Nah , it just went out .
rick_grimes Anything ?
theodore_douglas Yeah , a lot of dead generators and more empty fuel drums than I can count .
shane_walsh It ca n't be down to just that one lori is in their bedroom waving her arms under an air vent , trying to feel a flow .
carl_grimes Mom ? Something wrong ?
lori_grimes Uh , nothing . It 's just . the air conditioning stopped edwin sits at a desk looking at a photograph of a beautiful woman .

edwin_jenner I did the best I could in the time that I had . I hope you 'd be proud of that Tearing up he puts down the photo , picks up his work badge and walks to the windows of his office . They look down on the big room .
edwin_jenner We always think there 's gon na be more time . . Then it runs out dale is out in the hall , lori is , too . edwin walks out a door and down the hall past them .
carol_peletier Why is the air off ?
lori_grimes And the lights in our room ? daryl sticks his head out , he 's still got a liquor bottle in his hand .
daryl_dixon What 's going on ? Why is everything turned off ? edwin takes the whiskey bottle from daryl without slowing down .
edwin_jenner Energy use is being prioritized .
dale_horvath Air is n't a priority ? And lights ? edwin drinks straight from the bottle .
edwin_jenner It 's not up to me . Zone 5 is shutting itself down .
daryl_dixon Hey ! Hey , what the hell does that mean ? edwin keeps walking , everyone follows .
daryl_dixon Hey , man , I 'm talking to you . What do you mean it 's shutting itself down ? How can a building do anything ? Rick , T - Dog , glenn and shane come running to join them .
edwin_jenner You 'd be surprised .
lori_grimes Rick ? He motions her to wait . edwin walks down the stairs past rick and the others and up the steps to the big room .
rick_grimes Jenner , what 's happening ?

edwin_jenner The system is dropping all the nonessential uses of power . It 's designed to keep the computers running to the last possible second . That started as we approached the half - hour mark . Right on schedule edwin takes another drink from the bottle . He pauses at the steps that lead up to the work stations in the big room . Everyone has followed and is grouped around . edwin hands the bottle to daryl who angrily snatches it out of Edwin 's hand .
edwin_jenner It was the french .
andrea_harrison What ?

edwin_jenner They were the last ones to hold out as far as I know . While our people were bolting out the doors and committing suicide in the hallways , they stayed in the labs till the end . They thought they were close to a solution .
jacqui What happened ?
edwin_jenner The same thing that 's happening here . No power grid . Ran out of juice . The world runs on fossil fuel . I mean , how stupid is that ?
shane_walsh Let me tell you-- .
rick_grimes To Hell with it , Shane . I do n't even care . Lori , grab our things . Everybody , get your stuff . We 're getting out of here now !
jacqui Oh , okay .
shane_walsh What 's that ?
carl_grimes What 's that ?
vi 30 minutes to decontamination .
daryl_dixon Doc , what 's going on here ? edwin scans his badge and enters code into a security pad .
shane_walsh Everybody , y' all heard rick .
rick_grimes Get your stuff and let 's go ! Go now ! Go !
theodore_douglas Let 's go .
glenn_rhee Come on ! rick runs toward a security door that is sliding up to block the way back out of the C. D. C. rick runs toward it in a panic .
glenn_rhee No . Did you just lock us in ? He just locked us in ! edwin broadcasts on the monitor .
edwin_jenner We 've hit the 30-minute window . I am recording .
lori_grimes carl .
lori_grimes Mom ! daryl makes a run at Edwin .
daryl_dixon You son of a bitch !
rick_grimes Shane ! Shane !
daryl_dixon You locked us in here !
theodore_douglas No , stop . Do n't !
daryl_dixon You lying-- .
shane_walsh No no no no ! daryl tries to take edwin but shane and rick pull him off .
theodore_douglas Wait , no ! No , do n't do it shane holds daryl back even as he threatens edwin with the bottle .
rick_grimes Hey , Jenner , open that door now .
edwin_jenner There 's no point . Everything topside is locked down . The emergency exits are sealed .
daryl_dixon Well , open the damn things .
edwin_jenner That 's not something I control . The computers do . I told you once that front door closed , it would n't open again . You heard me say that . It 's better this way .
rick_grimes What is ? What happens in 28 minutes ? What happens in 28 minutes ? !
daryl_dixon Come on !

edwin_jenner You know what this place is ? ! We protected the public from very nasty stuff ! Weaponized smallpox ! Ebola strains that could wipe out half the country ! Stuff you do n't want getting out ! Ever ! edwin collects himself and sits back down at his station .
edwin_jenner In the event of a catastrophic power failure — in a terrorist attack , for example — H. I. T. s are deployed to prevent any organisms from getting out .
rick_grimes H. I. Ts ?
edwin_jenner Vi , define .

vi H. I. T. s — high - impulse thermobaric fuel - air explosives consist of a two - stage aerosol ignition that produces a blast wave of significantly greater power and duration than any other known explosive except nuclear . The vacuum - pressure effect ignites the oxygen at between 5 , 000 degrees and 6 , 000 degrees and is useful when the greatest loss of life and damage to structures is desired .
edwin_jenner It sets the air on fire . No pain carol holds sophia and they are crying .
edwin_jenner An end to sorrow , grief . regret . Everything daryl throws the liquor bottle at the door .
daryl_dixon Open the damn door ! shane runs at the door with a fire axe .
shane_walsh Out of my way ! t - dog tosses one to Daryl . He catches it and they both try to destroy the door .
theodore_douglas Daryl !
edwin_jenner You should 've left well enough alone it would have been so much easier .
